microservice.infrastructure.services

Class ActionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • microservice.infrastructure.services.ActionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CRUDServiceInterface<Action>

    @Service
public class ActionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements CRUDServiceInterface<Action>
    Handles CRUD for actions and handles when actions are triggered, to alert any microservice listening for the specific action.
